precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop area.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: A right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Themes" tab will become active and the contents of the "Display Properties" window will update to show the "Themes" tab options.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab within the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and select "None".
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will display "None" as the selected option. The "Wait:" field will be cleared.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Screen saver" dropdown menu, and then select "(None)".
expected_results: The dropdown menu will show "(None)" as the selected screen saver. The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on '3D FlowerBox' in the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The '3D FlowerBox' screen saver will be selected. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu should display 'None.' The 'Apply' button is highlighted.
The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, overlaying the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" option will be set to "After 5 hours" and the dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close. The desktop and taskbar will be visible.
